articles.author: KEN MORITSUGU, DIDI TANG
articles.title: China and US partners are moving closer as Trump returns to the White House - The Associated Press
articles.description: China's relations are starting to improve with Japan, India and other countries that former U.S. President Joe Biden courted, just as Donald Trump brings his more unilateralist approach back to the White House. The change at the top in the United States could…
